message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's worth a lot to me, but I believe it could be a valuable asset to your business as well. I'm willing to part with it for $1,750,000.  Let me know your thoughts!

Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I appreciate the value you place on it, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose an offer of $1,200,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate you coming back with a counteroffer. While your offer is lower than what I'm looking for, I'm willing to negotiate further. Let's meet in the middle at $1,400,000. This still leaves room for profit for both of us, and I believe this product will be a valuable addition to your business.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am still constrained by my budget. I would like to propose an offer of $1,350,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $1,350,000 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1,450,000. This is a fair price that allows me to make a decent profit and you to acquire a valuable product. Let's close this deal, I'm confident you won't regret it.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose an offer of $1,425,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Bob, I appreciate you moving closer to my desired price. While I'm happy with your willingness to negotiate, $1,425,000 is still a bit below what I'm looking for.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,437,500. This would be a fair deal for both of us, allowing me to make a good profit and you to secure a valuable product. Let's make this happen!

Thank you for your continued willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to propose an offer of $1,430,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise that allows us to move forward with the transaction.
